td.content: s:m aged 71 yrs describes severe blurred vision, mild increased thirst and mild frequent urination. o:Height 76 in, Weight 189 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16, heart = RRR, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Chest = normal breath sound B/L, Pelvic = no tenderness or mass, HEENT = PERRLA, EOMI, funduscopic exam normal, obese with NAD a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed LANTUS - 100 UNITS/ML subcutaneous daily, and ordered fasting plasma glucose.

td.content: s:patient presents with severe blurred vision for 5 days. pt also reports mild increased thirst, mild frequent urination. he is a white male aged 72 Ys. o:Height 76 in, Weight 190 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, heart = RRR, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Chest = normal breath sound B/L, Pelvic = no tenderness or mass, HEENT = PERRLA, EOMI, funduscopic exam normal, obese with NAD a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed LANTUS - 100 UNITS/ML subcutaneous daily, and ordered fasting plasma glucose.
